name: Power Hungry (ladydaphne)
description:
Made for Wowie 4.0 with theme "Collaborate with AI". 

You control a Stun Gun, while your ally tries to snatch batteries from your enemies' edges. Have fun.

P.S. "Start Tutorial" button on first scene is a bit hard to see. 

Thanks for checking out my first ever Game Jam with zero experience. 

Special thanks to my cousin Gülin Yolgan for drawing me a Sprite on Paint, and my lovely mother for inspiring and supporting me throughout this process.
